Oi, $MyPCName$, sou $npc:11003870[gender:0]$, da Ilha dos Bergs. Acabamos de analisar sua inscrição, e seu pagamento de 50.000.000 mesos já foi processado. Estou com seus formulários de autorização bem aqui, e tenho o prazer de lhe dar as boas-vindas à Mineradora Berg.
Hum… Acho que houve um engano. Eu não topei nada disso.

Hahaha. Muito engraçado. De qualquer forma, após um investimento considerável e um processo de verificação com um ano de duração, imagino que você esteja $male:ansioso,female:ansiosa$ para começar a aproveitar seu acesso exclusivo a um dos depósitos minerais mais ricos e variados já descobertos no mundo.
Mas eu não paguei por isso…

Hãã… Você é mesmo $male:o,female:a$ $MyPCName$, não é? É improvável que nossos contadores tenham trocado o número de identificação, mas eu ficaria estarrecido de permitir por engano o acesso a minerais equivalentes a centenas de milhões de mesos a alguém que não é membro da mineradora...
C-centenas… de milhões…? Sim, sim, eu sou $MyPCName$, e posso visitar a Ilha "Não sei o quê" agora mesmo.

Ah, excelente! Por um instante, pensei que um de nossos funcionários tivesse cometido um erro terrível que seria o fim de sua carreira. Enfim, venha me procurar na $map:02000424$, e eu preparo tudo para você!
Vá procurar $npc:11000454[gender:0]$ no $map:02000062$. Ele vai organizar sua viagem.
<font color="#909090">(Isto é sério mesmo? Talvez seja melhor você ir ao $map:02000062$.)</font>
Um bom dia pra uma tempestade, não é mesmo?
Então lá estava eu na maior enrascada. Eu em um bote salva-vidas furado, fugindo o mais rápido possível, diante da fúria tempestuosa do mar… Não foi das minhas viagens mais tranquilas.
Falando nisso… sabe, uma vez eu quase me casei com uma sereia! Acho que escapei de uma fria, mas às vezes penso naquelas pobres sereias que perderam uma oportunidade.
<font color="#909090">(Do outro lado da sala, $npcName:11000453$ revira os olhos em sinal de ceticismo.)</font>
E? E? O que aconteceu depois?
Ah, sabe como é, diferenças culturais. Afinal, nós viemos de mundos diferentes!
Não… O barco! O que aconteceu com o barco?
Aham!
Ah, olá, $male:marujo,female:maruja$. Você precisa de alguma coisa?
Só quero uma carona para a $map:02000424$.
Aah, aposto que é de você que $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$ estava falando! $male:O novo,female:A nova$ integrante da Mineradora Berg! $male:Sortudo!,female:Sortuda$!
Já resolvi tudo com o $npc:11000981[gender:0]$ lá no cais ao sul do $map:02000062$. Ele vai reservar sua passagem para a $map:02000424$.
Moço, termine sua história, por favor!
Ahaha, isso! Onde eu estava? Acho que vou começar de novo…
NÃO! Hum, você parou na parte em que você chegou à $map:02000424$!
Então! Pois então, lá estava eu, deitado no litoral da $map:02000424$, mal respirando, e sem nenhum barco para chamar de meu.
Como eu estava ilhado, tudo o que podia fazer era esperar. Mas já que sou o melhor pescador do $map:02000062$, pelo menos eu não teria que me preocupar com o risco de passar fome.
<font color="#909090">($npcName:11000455$ parece um pouco cético, mas continua absorto.)</font>
Ah!
Entre uma pesca e outra, explorei os segredos da $map:02000424$. E descobri… que ela é cheia de rochas! Não rochas comuns, mas minerais até onde a vista alcança!
Sim, eu conquistei a $map:02000424$ sozinho, graças a minha perseverança e esperteza! Se ao menos eu tivesse sido o primeiro a reivindicá-la, estaria rico.
Você é demais mesmo!
Ahaha! Se eu ganhasse um meso pra toda vez que ouvisse isso…
Foi o $npc:11000454[gender:0]$ que me enviou.
Ah, você é $male:o,female:a$ entusiasta da mineração de que $npc:11000454[gender:0]$ me falou. Neste caso, acho que ninguém seria capaz de apreciar a $map:02000424$ como você.
Você vai precisar pegar um barco da Mineradora Berg para ir à $map:02000424$. Eu cuido de toda a papelada. Tenho algumas cópias que já comecei a preencher.
Esse barco vai levar você direto para a $map:02000424$, sem paradas nem escalas. Chegando lá, pode procurar o $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$. Aposto que você mal pode esperar para vê-lo.
Felizmente, o mar está calmo hoje. Boa viagem!
Felizmente, o mar está calmo hoje. Boa viagem!

$male:Bem-vindo,female:Bem-vinda$ à $map:02000424$. Esta ilha pertence à Mineradora Berg, e agora você pode ter o orgulho de se considerar um membro. Desde que não ultrapasse seu limite diário, você pode minerar o quanto quiser.
Você tem sorte que o tempo está limpo e o mar está calmo. Andar de barco pode ser perigoso.
Depois que a $map:02000424$ foi comprada pela Mineradora Berg, uma pesquisa geológica revelou que ela é um dos lugares com maior diversidade mineral do planeta.
E agora você, além de certos indivíduos cuidadosamente selecionados, pode se beneficiar dos lucros.
Sempre que precisar minerar pedras preciosas, este é o lugar.
O que torna esta ilha tão especial é que existem bem aqui veios de quase todos os minerais encontrados no Mundo Maple. É como um paraíso das rochas!
Ei, já que está aqui… Acha que pode me ajudar?
É apenas um pequeno favor. Literalmente, é um pequeno objeto que eu quero que você entregue. Já que meu trabalho aqui é como cuidador da ilha, seria estranho se eu mesmo fizesse isso. Então… tome.
<font color="#909090">(Como isso é estranho…?)</font>
Entregue esta $item:30001128$ para um $npcTitle:11003871$ chamado $npcName:11003871[gender:0]$</font>. Se você subir esses degraus e seguir o caminho, logo vai acabar se encontrando com ele.
Eu sei que você acabou de chegar aqui, mas pra ser honesto, este é um ÓTIMO jeito para entender como as coisas funcionam!
Entregue esta $item:30001128$ para um $npcTitle:11003871$ chamado $npcName:11003871[gender:0]$</font>. Se você subir esses degraus e seguir o caminho, logo vai acabar se encontrando com ele.
Eu perdi a $item:30001128$…
Como pôde ser tão $male:desastrado,female:desastrada$ a ponto de perdê-la? Vá arranjar outra!
Hã? Você já tem uma, não tem? Acorda!
Sua bolsa está cheia. Libere um pouco de espaço.
Hum? Posso ajudar?
<font color="#909090">(Você entrega a $item:30001128$ para o $npc:11003871[gender:0]$.)</font>
Por que você está me dando isto? Onde está o $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$?

Nem foi isto o que eu pedi. Aposto que o $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$ não conseguiu arranjar o item certo e mandou você aqui para que ele não precisasse se envolver nisso. $male:Coitado,female:Coitada$ de você.
Bom, não é culpa sua. Obrigado por tentar. Talvez eu consiga encontrar algo pra fazer com esta $item:30001128$.
Pois é, acho que agora vou voltar para onde $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$ está…
Ah, espere aí! Já que está aqui, pode me ajudar com uma coisa?
Ah, eu adoraria, mas estou $male:ocupado,female:ocupada$...
Ah, eu adoraria…
Ah, tá bom. Não tem problema. É, sem problema, vou continuar trabalhando enquanto minha filha cresce sem o pai, e minha esposa fica mais distante a cada dia.
Sério, não é problema. Isso me dá mais tempo pra descobrir o que vou falar pra minha filha quando ela crescer e perguntar pro seu pai o que ele está fazendo da vida.
Ser pai é isso mesmo. Sim, eu realmente não preciso de ajuda nem nada do tipo. Continue cuidando de seus negócios urgentes. Tenho certeza de que são muito importantes. Muito. Importantes.
Ah, eu adoraria…
É mesmo? Valeu!
Colete os minerais que encontrar por aqui e leve para o $npcName:11003872[gender:0]$.
Obrigado pela ajuda!
Colete os minerais que encontrar por aqui e leve para o $npcName:11003872[gender:0]$.
Quem é você, e por que trouxe minerais pra mim? Você tem licença pra ficar carregando isso por aí?
Estou fazendo um favor para o $npc:11003871[gender:0]$.
Ah, o $npc:11003871[gender:0]$ lhe pediu isso! Não estou surpreso que ele esteja tentando se livrar do trabalho desse jeito… De qualquer modo, obrigado.
Mas então, se você está aqui na $map:02000424$, isso deve ser sinal de que você está bem na fita com a mineradora. Você deve ser confiável. Diligente.
Se esse é o caso, fico feliz em ter você por aqui.
Ah, sim! Com certeza. Vamos ser amigos!
É isso aí! É um prazer… $male:amigo,female:amiga$!
É melhor eu voltar para falar com $npcName:11003870[gender:0]$...
Pessoas legais como você, são sempre bem-vindas!
Nossa, você parece $male:exausto,female:exausta$. Como está se saindo na $map:02000424$?
Ah, isso é ótimo. Muitas pedras e muitas pessoas que… precisam de coisas.
Ha! É, eu ouvi falar que você tem andado pela ilha toda. A mineradora com certeza escolheu você por um motivo.
Bom, você é sempre $male:bem-vindo,female:bem-vinda$! Tenho certeza, e isso é o bastante para todos.
Venha visitar a $map:02000424$ quando quiser!
Olá, como vai?
Embora a maioria das pessoas me conheça como $npcName:11000005[gender:1]$, a Bibliotecária Chefe da $map:02000031$, também sou membro da Guilda dos Alkimis!
Entrei em contato com você porque a guilda está à sua procura. Não se preocupe, isso é uma coisa boa!
A guilda reconheceu seu incrível talento como $male:coletor,female:coletora$, $MyPCName$, e por isso gostaria de convidar você para a $map:02000425$.
Vá para o $map:02000069$ no $map:02000062$ e fale com uma $npcTitle:11003876$ chamada $npcName:11003876[gender:1]$. Ela vai se encarregar de sua viagem para a $map:02000425$.
Só isso! Acho que queriam que eu lhe contasse pessoalmente para que você não pensasse que a oferta não é pra valer.
<font color="#909090">(É melhor você ir ao $map:02000062$ e encontrar a $npc:11003876[gender:1]$ no bar $map:02000069$.)</font>
… Eu adoraria que os livros não ficassem tão empoeirados.
Ah, aí está você! $MyPCName$, certo?
Sim, sou eu. Mas então, quem são esses da Guilda dos Alkimis, e por que eles querem que eu vá à ilha deles?
Você não sabe? A Guilda dos Alkimis é especializada em alquimia. Achei que eles tivessem te convidado porque você é um tipo de especialista em coletar ervas.
Não é qualquer um que pode alugar um barco para a $map:02000425$, sabia? É uma grande honra ser convidado!
Dizem que é um lugar muito bonito. E você está indo para lá! Que inveja!
De qualquer forma, acho que eles querem que eu ajude você a arranjar um navio para chegar lá. Eu não me importo, é claro. Fico bem à vontade com os navios!
Não vamos perder mais tempo, $MyPCName$! Para o navio!
Nós estamos perdendo tempo! Rápido!
Certo, estaremos partindo daqui pra ir até a $map:02000425$. Nos dê um segundo para deixarmos o navio em ordem!
Tudo pronto? Estamos prontos para partir!
Você pode pegar o navio para a $map:02000425$ quando quiser!
Boa viagem! E volte com algumas fotos ou algo assim!
Quero ver aquela paisagem maravilhosa da $map:02000425$!
Adeus! E volte com algumas fotos ou algo assim! Quero ver aquela paisagem maravilhosa da $map:02000425$!
Olá, receba as boas-vindas à $map:02000425$.
Eu sou $npcName:11003878[gender:1]$, a zeladora da $map:02000425$. Espero que a jornada até aqui não tenha sido um problema pra você.
A ilha pertence à Guilda dos Alkimis, e costumava ser um santuário de ervas. Nós mantemos a paz e a integridade deste lugar restringindo visitas.
Você foi $male:escolhido,female:escolhida$, $MyPCName$, por causa de seu talento extraordinário e seu dom para cuidar dessas ervas.
Minha nossa, acabei de lembrar. Eu deveria ter mandado o almoço para $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$, nosso $npcTitle:11003879$, mas receio ter perdido a hora.
Talvez possamos nos ajudar então? Se você entregar a marmita, pode passear pela ilha e ainda corrigir minha terrível omissão.
Parece ser muito trabalho…

Minha nossa! A última coisa que quero é fazer você desperdiçar seu tempo! Eu lhe asseguro, nunca designo tarefas sem importância aos meus auxiliares. Jamais! Todo favor que peço tem um propósito claro.
Entregue esta marmita ao $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$. Ficarei eternamente grata!
Entregue esta marmita ao $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$. Ficarei eternamente grata!
Pode me dar outra $item:30001130$?
Não me diga que você a perdeu! Acha que é fácil preparar uma marmita? Não a perca desta vez!
Isso que está na sua mão não é a marmita? Você deve estar muito $male:cansado,female:cansada$ mesmo.
Você devia conferir sua bolsa primeiro. Acho que ela está cheia.
O que posso fazer por você?
Escuta, estou com esta marmita para $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$.
*Suspiro*… $npcName:11003878[gender:1]$ se esqueceu do nosso almoço outra vez, não foi?
Obrigado. Eu estava ficando com fome e perdendo a esperança de receber o meu almoço. Como você se chama?
Eu sou $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$. Legal.
$MyPCName$. Você obviamente tem um bom coração. Poderia me fazer um favor?
Como estou no meu horário de almoço, você poderia arrancar as <font color="#ffd200">ervas daninhas</font> por aqui enquanto eu como?
Você não podia fazer isso depois do almoço?
Eu poderia. Se eu engolisse tudo o mais rápido possível.
Mas você viu essa comida, certo? É claro que pode apreciar estes sabores e aromas maravilhosos. Eu quero aproveitar o quanto posso.
Tá bom, tá bom, mas pare de falar. Você está me deixando com fome.
Eu realmente agradeço. Nunca consigo aproveitar os meus almoços!
Nhac, nhac…
$npc:11003879[gender:0]$ está aproveitando mesmo o almoço dele…
Parece que você terminou de almoçar.
Humm, uma mordida melhor que a outra! Não sei como lhe agradecer por ter me dado um tempo para relaxar um pouco.
Pronto, esvaziei a lancheira. Por favor, devolva-a à $npc:11003878[gender:1]$ quando você voltar para lá.
<font color="#909090">(Parece que você vai ter que procurar a $npc:11003878[gender:1]$ novamente.)</font>
Você é $male:um verdadeiro herói,female:uma verdadeira heroína$, camarada! Volte em segurança!
Estou satisfeito. Fazia muito tempo que eu não aproveitava de verdade uma refeição.
Pode me dar outra $item:30001131$?
Parece que não fiz nada além de falar, e acabei me esquecendo por completo de lhe dar a $item:30001131$. Tome, pode pegar.
Ela já está na sua bolsa, não está?
Por que você não esvazia sua bolsa primeiro?
<font color="#909090">(Você devolve a lancheira vazia para $npc:11003878[gender:1]$.)</font>
Então, o que acha da $map:02000425$?
É uma bela ilha, não é?
Adoro este lugar.

Eu vi você arrancando ervas daninhas para o $npcName:11003879[gender:0]$. Não imaginei que você fosse tão $male:generoso,female:generosa$. Vejo que fizemos bem ao convidá-$male:lo,female:la$ para vir aqui. Fique à vontade para aproveitar as dádivas da ilha quando quiser!
Não é muito, mas você merece algo pelo seu trabalho. Espero que goste.

(Say that you came as Humanitas requested you to help the refugees.)
I feel that <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> is starting to show concern for the refugees. We are in a difficult situation...
Have you lived a life where you never have enough to eat? Take a look around here in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>. It's a cursed land that can't grow anything.
Our only source of food in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> is the animals. But hunting has become difficult as the mechanical lifeforms attack the refugees that go out hunting.
I don't know who made them and why they are attacking us, but I am sure of one thing. The refugees will collapse from starvation if this goes on.
If you want to help us, defeat the mechanical lifeforms in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>.
If you want to help us, defeat the mechanical lifeforms in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>, and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>.
I see you took care of that efficiently. The refugees that went out hunting returned uninjured.
They returned with plenty of game in their hands. Thanks.
Stranger, help us. The 'Three Poing Brothers' are attacking the Leshies!
<font color="#909090">(Three Poing Brothers? They must be the Poings exposed to aetherine!)</font>
The Leshy Giants fought with them and were utterly beaten. The Leshies are at a loss because of their combination tactic.
When you face the first Poing, the second and third appear to help. As you face the three, they combine into the 'Three Poing Brothers'.
The combined 'Three Poing Brothers' are too strong and the Leshies can't go against them.
(Say that you'll help and ask where those Poings are.)
The 'Three Poing Brothers' are roaming about <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>. Please be careful.
The 'Three Poing Brothers' are roaming about <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>. Please be careful.
(Say that you defeated the 'Three Poing Brothers'.)
Thank you very much. Stranger saved many Leshies.
I, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004620[gender:0]$</font>, will not forget stranger's help.
Tairen is attacking us. Kharon alone is too much for us...
You... did you come to help because you knew that?
Yep.
Well... seems you have a conscience. Tairen wouldn't have attacked us if Humanitas never came here...
After settling in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>, they never attacked us. That is until we made contact with Humantias.
(Say the important thing right now is to defend <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and prevent harm to the refugees.)
...You're right. Could you suppress the Tairen forces? We'll beef up the shelter's security while you're at it.
You're right. Could you suppress the Tairen forces? We'll beef up the shelter's security while you're at it.
We were able to defend <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> thanks to you. We will return this favor, stranger.
We need to repair the things that got destroyed. If you're not going to help... please go back, stranger.
(Say that you'll go back.)
Wait! I'm not used to thanking someone... Thank you for saving the refugees, stranger.
Blasted Kharon! Only one out of the five that went hunting returned.
They were all kidnapped by Kharon. The last one was also kidnapped, but was released.
They're trying to instill fear in us.
(Say that you will suppress the Kharon forces to prevent any more kidnappings.)
Would you do it? Thank you, stranger.
Let them have a taste of the most terrible thing in this world for kidnapping refugees from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
Let them have a taste of the most terrible thing in this world for kidnapping refugees from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
(Say that you oppressed all of the Kharon forces roaming about <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
Thanks, stranger. Those that got captured didn't return... but we at least got our revenge.
<font color="#909090">(You have mixed feelings. Revenge will lead to more revenge...)</font>
I need some time alone. Could you go back, stranger?
The forest is turning black. It's because of those dark beings.
The forest lifeforms have been tainted black and are following the dark beings. Soon, they will attack us to steal our mysterious power.
(Ask what the mysterious power is.)
It's a power that was handed to us a long time ago by beings that fly in the sky... They said the power needed to be protected by the Leshies. I can't tell you more than this, stranger.
This can't fall into the hands of those dark beings. Can you help us?
How can I help?
Thanks. Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and give rest to the lifeforms tainted by the dark power.
Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and give rest to the lifeforms tainted by the dark power.
(Say that you gave rest to the lifeforms encroached by the dark power.)
Thanks. They were our family and part of the forest not too long ago.
But we will protect the mysterious power no matter what sacrifices we make.
The dark beings don't know what giving up is. Not only did they taint the forest, but the lifeforms in the forest as well.
(Ask if it's to steal the mysterious power handed to the Leshies.)
Why is everyone interested in the mysterious power? Are you also coveting the mysterious power?
(Say that you came to help prevent the mysterious power falling into the hands of the Daemon Army.)
(And say that the tainted lifeforms will soon attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
...Humanitas has never caused the Leshies harm since they arrived here. I will trust you.
Those poor lifeforms tainted by the dark power... Please give rest to those poor souls trying to attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.
Those poor lifeforms tainted by the dark power... Please give rest to the poor souls trying to attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.
(Say that you defeated the lifeforms tainted by the dark power.)
Thanks. The dark beings won't give up, but neither will the Leshies. We will protect the mysterious power.
(Say that you will help as much as you can.)
Darn it, this is despairing. If this continues, it's a matter of time until <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> falls.
(Ask whether Kharon launched a full-scale attack to take <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
That's not it. They're continuing to launch a series of attacks. They're kidnapping refugees from all over the place.
They are the newly appointed Kharon commanders... They appeared and disappeared in an instant. <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> is in panic right now.
If we let this be, $map:02020066$ will be stricked by fear and collapse from within.
(Say that you will suppress the Kharon commanders if you're given their location.)

Really? <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022801$</font> usually appears in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022811$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
It won't be easy to find them. Yet I leave this to you, stranger.
$npcName:25022801$ usually appears in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022811$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
(Say that you suppressed all of the Kharon commandders.)
Thanks. A second later and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> would have collapsed.

The residents were in a state of confusion and were about to leave this place, throwing caution to the wind. Even if they did leave, they would be kidnapped by Kharon in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
Ahem... well, I guess we're a little closer to Humanitas now.
Ugh... we need something to eat to muster strength... I'm more worried of the children.
(Say that you came because the hunting activity of the refugees visibly decreased and you're worried.)
It's because of those horrible things. The beasts that Kharon trained and released...
No one is hunting because they attack the residents that go out hunting..
(Ask they should hunt those beasts and eat them.)
They are too savage! Many were injured after getting bitten or struck...
Forget about hunting. It's hard to even survive.
(Say that you will go and drive out Kharon's beasts.)
Please. If at least the children could eat something.
You easily find Kharon's beasts in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
You easily find Kharon's beasts in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
Thanks, stranger. People started hunting near the shelter.
(Say that you will teach how to hunt the beasts.)
It's slowly getting busy. You should go back, stranger.
(Say that you came after hearing about the schism with the Leshies.)
They are the Leshies insisting on driving out strangers. They are trying to break the peace of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> that we kept so far.
On the surface, they are attacking strangers. But they are actually hoodlums committing all sorts of wrong deeds.
<font color="#909090">(Awkward calling them Leshy hoodlums, but it will get dangerous if they're not nipped in the bud.)</font>
(Say that you will suppress the Leshy hoodlums roaming around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Thanks. Teach them a good lesson to prevent them from misleading any more Leshies.
(Say that you will suppress the Leshy hoodlums roaming around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Thanks. We have Leshies who voluntarily returned after the lesson you taught.
May flowers bloom in your soul, stranger.
(Ask why the number of surveillance drones in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> decreased.)
Parts... it's because of parts. Do you think there's another reason? Many drones are getting damaged by Kharon's attacks.
Refugees that were former scientists are trying to fix, but we're now low on parts...
We can't go to Tairen and buy parts... Kharon will suddenly attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> if we have a few drones.
(Say they should use <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001353$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022206$</font> flying near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Are you talking about those robot insects? I don't know their identity, but I'm sure they were made by Tairen in the past.
Their <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001353$</font> might be compatible with the drone. Could you get it for us?
I can get it.
(Say they should use <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001353$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022206$</font> flying near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Say that you brought <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001353$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022206$</font>.
It's compatible with the drone! Phew... This is one less worry.
Thanks, stranger.
(Ask if there's anything you can help.)
We are always in need of help. We are not abundant like <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font>.
We are always in need of aetherine as there is only 1 aetherine fusion device in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>. It's a compact one to boot.
We're almost running out of aetherine and don't have any methods.
(Suggest taking <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001354$</font> from the magic wand of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022204$</font> stationed near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
That's a great idea! Why didn't I think of that? Can you act on it now?
It's because we're low on aetherine. Please, stranger.
(Suggest taking <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001354$</font> from the magic wand of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022204$</font> stationed near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
(Say that you removed <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001354$</font> from the magic wand of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022204$</font>.)
These crystals are very high in purity! Tairen uses high quality aetherine even on mere magic wands...
We don't need to worry about aetherine for a while with this amount. Thanks, stranger from Humanitas.
(Say that you came after hearing the increased activity of Kharon near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
As expected, the intelligence of Humanitas is accurate. It's Kharon's kidnapping season again.
When those that were kidnapped become weak and useless, they resum their large scale kidnapping.
Darn it, three refugees that went hunting in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> today didn't return. ....
(Say that you'll go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> right now and defeat Kharon that kidnapped the refugees.)
Thanks, stranger. I hope there will be no more victims.
(Say that you'll go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> right now and defeat Kharon that kidnapped the refugees.)
(Say that you defeated the Kharon forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
Thanks, there won't be any victims for a while but... it's painful for the victims we lost.
I need some time alone. Could you go back, stranger?
(Say that you came after hearing about Kharon torturing refugees for fun.)
You must be talking about <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022306$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>. They're throwing knives for fun and getting the refugees hurt.
They're monsters torturing people as if killing bugs for fun. It's pathetic that the only thing I can do is get angry...
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and suppress Kharon throwing knives at refugees.)
...Thanks, stranger.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and suppress Kharon throwing knives at refugees.)
(Say that you defeated the Kharon forces that threw knives at refugees for fun.)
Are we insignficant beings to them? How miserable.
Thanks, stranger. Seems like I didn't make the wrong choice... to trust in Humanitas.
(Say that you came to discuss on strengthening the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Thank you for the suggestion, but I can't allow Humanitas to station here.
(Say what if Humanitas provides modern weapons to the Leshies.)
Thank you, but that goes against our law. Leshies fight with their weapon.
<font color="#909090">(They are no match for the Daemon Army with that uncouth cudgel...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Ah! There was <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022403$</font> going around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The cudgel will become a powerful weapon if it's embedded with <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001355$</font>!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(The cudgel will become a powerful weapon if it's embedded with <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001355$</font>!)</font>
Isn't this <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001355$</font>?
(Say that embedding <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001355$</font> will make the cudgel into a powerful weapon.)
That's a brilliant idea! What a wise stranger. I'm amazed.
I'll tell the hammering Leshies right away to embed the cudgel with the poisonous sting.
Thanks. We will protect the 'mysterious power' with this excellent weapon.
(Say the lifeform living near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> are slowly besieging the hideout.)
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022502$</font>... poor things encroached by the dark beings.
I knew they were under the control of the dark beings, but I never imagined they would besiege this place.
I'm certain they are trying to steal the mysterious power of the Leshies. Stranger, will you help us?
(Say you will suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022502$</font> threatening <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> right now.)
(Say you will suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022502$</font> threatening <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> right now.)
(Say that you suppressed <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022502$</font> that besieged <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
I thank you on behalf of the Leshies, but they will not stop in trying to steal the mysterious power.
(Say that you will stop the Daemon Army together.)
Leshies are reassured stranger is with us.
(Say you heard about the chaotic mood in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and came.)
It's because of the Leshy hoodlums. They go around in groups committing all sorts of wrong deeds.
They trouble Leshies, steal things, and threaten to join their group.
They were formed with the pretext of driving out strangers, but actually grouped together to commit wrong deeds.
(Say that <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> will become uncontrollable if they are left alone.)
My thoughts exactly, stranger. Will you help us?
(Say that you will teach those hoodlums roaming around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> a lesson right now.)
(Say that you will teach those hoodlums roaming around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> a lesson right now.)
(Say that you drove out all of the Leshy hoodlums roaming around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
(Say that they won't hang around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> for a while.)
I owe you big. May flowers bloom in your kind soul.
(Say that you came after receiving information the Kharon forces are throwing grenades at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
You heard right. They are throwing grenades indiscriminately.
It's not like they have a purpose. It seems they're trying to destroy <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> out of hatred.
<font color="#909090">(Can't say I'm not responsible... I'm the one who angered them.)</font>
(Say that you will go and defeat the Kharon forces throwing the grenades right now.)
(Say that you will go and defeat the Kharon forces throwing the grenades right now.)
(Say that you defeated all of the Kharon forces throwing grenades at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
I know. It became quiet thanks to you.
I owe you big. Thanks, stranger.
(Ask if he knows about the increased forces of the Daemon Army stationed in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
I think they are trying to taint <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> black. The places where the forces increased became black.
We don't know exactly. They don't usually attack us but...
They attack without mercy when those that went hunting thoughtlessly get near. All I heard is what the hunters saw from afar.
<font color="#909090">(Is the Daemon Army trying to encroach even <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> with the dark power?!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(I need to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and see for myself.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(I need to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and see for myself.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(I couldn't find out in the end why the Daemon Army increased their forces...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(I threw caution to the wind and just went at them...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(I'm sure they weren't simply trying to corrupt <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(It's unfortunate, but I will need to take it slow and observe them...)</font>
(Say you couldn't find the reason for the increase, but suppressed many of the Daemon Army forces.)
Those that went out hunting will be harassed less by those dark beings. We're fine with that.
Thanks, stranger.
(Say that you came to rescue the refugees kidnapped by Kharon in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
It's too late. They should be doing forced labor by now in the Kharon base wherever it is. Kharon, unforgivable...
(Ask if there's anything you can help.)
The refugees that got kidnapped are the ones that went hunting. The food shortage here is getting worse due to the kidnapping by Kharon.
It's not like we can eat grass, and there are only beasts that Kharon released in the vicnity... We will become food for the beasts if we attacked them.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and rescue <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001360$</font>.)
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and rescue <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001360$</font>.)
Meat! And so many! Did you really hunt the beasts of Kharon?
(Point at the horns on the skin.)
It's certainly <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001360$</font>. I can't believe you hunted those terrifying things... What is your identity, stranger?
(Say that you are a good citizen belonging to the Maple Alliance and carrying out a mission from Humanitas.)
Thanks, good citizen. I will distribute the meat before it goes bad.
(Say that you came after hearing the rumor that <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> is filled with fear.)
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> is attacking the Leshies. Many Leshies were injured after it spurted poisonous sap everywhere.
(Ask why <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> is attacking the Leshies.)
It was encroached by the dark power. The sensitive <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> went insane after going under the control of the dark beings.
With its mind broken down, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> is wandering the forest while spurting poisonous sap on every living thing.
<font color="#909090">(<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> must be stopped before the damage gets worse.)</font>
<font color="#909090">(<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> must be stopped before the damage gets worse.)</font>
(Say that <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> won't attack lifeforms anymore.)
Did you give them rest?
Yep.
Thanks. Oh good person, may your soul bear fruits.
(Ask if there's anything you can help.)
Can you help us repair the temple? It's a sacred temple where the 'mysterious power' of the Leshies is enshrined.
(Say you have no experience with construction.)
There is no way we would leave such a sacred task to a stranger! The temple will be repaired by the Leshies.
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001361$</font> is needed to repair the walls. Can you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and get it?
(Say that you will get it.)
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001361$</font> is needed to repair the walls. Can you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and get it?
(Say that you got <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001361$</font>.)
It's still sticky... You brought very fresh ones!
What a commendable stranger. May the mysterious power bless you.
(Say that you came after hearing information on the ecological disturbance near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
It's because of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>'s pollen. When <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>'s pollen enters the eyes of animals...
The animals hallucinate and lose their sense of direction.
That is when <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font> consumes the animals.
The damage to the animals isn't small as <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font> increased in numbers recently.
(Say that you will reduce the number of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font> living near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Really? Thanks.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and reduce the number of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>.)
(Say that you reduced the number of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>.)
Look at the sky. You can clearly see <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>'s pollen diminished.
Thanks for protecting the forest. We will not forget stranger's help.
(Say that you came after hearing <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022505$</font> intruded on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
This is the doing of the Leshy hoodlums. They captured <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022505$</font> and released it here.
(Ask why the Leshy hoodlums did that.)
They're taking advantage of the chaos to steal. While the Leshies flee from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022505$</font>, they come and steal.
If nothing is done, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> will fall into great confusion.
(Say that you will destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022505$</font> going through <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
(Say that you will destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022505$</font> going through <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
(Say that you destroyed <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022505$</font> going through <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
The hoodlums got away from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.
They quickly escaped after realizing <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022505$</font> was destroyed.
Peace has returned to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>! It's thanks to you, stranger.
(Say that you came after hearing information on the chaotic atmosphere in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
The psychological warfare by Kharon worked. <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022207$</font> carved a threatening message around <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> with a dagger.
It said <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> will be burned to the ground if we don't surrender voluntarily within a week.
The refugees are in a state of confusion because of that. They are breaking rules and doing whatever they want. Now there are those who refuse to listen to me.
(Say that you will free the refugees from fear by defeating <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022207$</font> near <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
(Say that you will free the refugees from fear by defeating <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022207$</font> near <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
(Say that you defeated <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022207$</font> near <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>, and this should be spread to the refugees quickly.)
<font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> almost fell into danger because some refugees caused a disturbance not too long ago. I will announce it immediately and restore order.
Thanks, stranger.
Sigh, I can't do this anymore. Many residents that went hunting were injured.
(Say that you came after hearing the news that refugees got injured.)
(Ask what happened.)

The residents that went hunting near <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> were attacked by <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022203$</font>. They used their frightening pincers and attacked the refugees for no reason.
We don't know why we are being attacked, but <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> will collapse from injury and hunger if nothing is done.
(Say that you will destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022203$</font> wandering <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
(Say that you will destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022203$</font> wandering <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
(Say that you destroyed <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022203$</font> wandering <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
I should send the hunters soon. The children are very hungry.
I owe you, stranger.
(Say that you came to discuss a way to cool the heat in <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>.)
Seems like you managed to find that out. Places with shade are fine. It's places without shade that are boiling.
(Ask what you can help with.)
It will be helpful if you can get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001363$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022305$</font> flying in the skies of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001363$</font> is excellent in blocking the burning light. It's the best as a shade.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> right now and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001363$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022305$</font>.)
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> right now and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001363$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022305$</font>.)
(Say that you brought <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001363$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022305$</font>.)
You brought it in a clean state with no flaws. Plenty of shades can be set up all over <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font> with this quantity.
When the hunters exhausted from the heat return to <font color="#ffd200">Galan</font>, they'll be able to rest in a cozy rest area.
The refugees will be ecstatic, stranger.
(Say the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> needs to be tightened since the Daemon Army is after the mysterious power.)
Do you have any ideas?
(Humanitas would like to offer modern weapons and military training.)
Thanks, but we refuse. Leshies fight with their own weapon.
<font color="#909090">(They are no match for the Daemon Army with that uncouth cudgel...)</font>
<font color="#909090">(That's right! <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022507$</font> lives near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Sticking <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001365$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022507$</font> into the cudgel will make it a powerful weapon!)</font>
<font color="#909090">(Sticking <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001365$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022507$</font> into the cudgel will make it a powerful weapon!)</font>
Isn't this a tooth from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022507$</font>? It's really sharp.
(Say that sticking the teeth of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022507$</font> into the Leshy's cudgel will make it a powerful weapon.)
That's the brightest idea! The Leshies will have a great weapon now!
Thanks. We will defend the 'mysterious power' with the new weapon.
(Say that you came after hearing the news that Leshies living in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> have become very active.)
We are repairing the temple that enshrines the mysterious power. Leshies are working together to repair the old temple.
<font color="#909090">(Phew... Fortunately, it wasn't something bad.)</font>
(Ask if there's anything you can help.)
Could you get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001366$</font> near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001366$</font> has an intense color and is needed to repair the murals of the temple.
(Say that you will get it.)
Could you get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001366$</font> near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(Say that you brought <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001366$</font>.)
It's high quality <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001366$</font>! The magnificent murals of the temple can be restored with this.
We express our thanks to stranger's goodwill. May the mysterious power be with you.
(Say that you came after hearing the news that <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> is being contaminated by the dark power at a rapid pace.)
The Daemon Army in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> built up their forces not too long ago. That is when it all started...
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> is rapidly being encroached by the dark power. I'm sure the dark beings built up their forces to contaminate the forest whole.
The built up force is called <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022400$</font>.
<font color="#909090">(If nothing is done, the entirety of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> will be encroached by the dark power.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022400$</font>.)
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022400$</font>.)
(Say that you went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and suppressed <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022400$</font>.)
I can feel peace has returned to the forest. I, <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font>, can feel it without seeing it.
The contamination of the dark beings hasn't been completely removed but... Leshies will make an effort to recover the pure forest.
(Say that you came after hearing the news that Leshies in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> are lacking food.)

It's because of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022401$</font> released in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> by the dark beings. Maybe they're not being fed... they're devouring the fruits in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>.
The Leshies lack food because of that. It breaks my heart to see the young Leshies go hungry.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and defeat the beasts of the Daemon Army.)
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> and defeat the beasts of the Daemon Army.)
(Say that you drove out all of the beasts of the Daemon Army prowling around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>.)
Thank you very much. I need to send Leshies to quickly pick fruits in the forest. Stranger, wait a moment and have some fruits of the Leshies.
(Say you're fine and it's the thought that counts.)
May your soul bear fruits, stranger.
